summary: Comprehensive testing completed for University IT Inventory System. Backend APIs working 100% (20/20 tests passed). Frontend functionality working excellently with proper role-based access control. Minor UI interaction issue with dropdown clicks but core functionality intact.

resolved_issues.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error causing 500 responses
resolved_issues.resolution: Fixed by implementing clean_dict_for_json function to handle ObjectId serialization

ui_bugs.issue: Click interception preventing dropdown selection in some cases
ui_bugs.workaround: Direct navigation and form filling works correctly

passed_tests: Dashboard statistics display (total equipment, by type, by status, by department)
Equipment CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Role-based access control (user read-only, admin edit, superadmin full)
